PhysicalGroup

class pyrit.geometry.PhysicalGroup(tag: int, dim: int, name: Optional[str] = None)

Bases: object

Class for physical group object that can be added directly to GMSH.

Constructor of the class Physical_Group.

Parameters

  • tag (int) – Unique tag of the physical group. If tag < 0 gmsh sets the tag, otherwise the tag should be > 0.

  • dim (int) – Dimension of the physical group.

  • name (str, optional) – Unique name of the physical group, by default None.

Return type

None.

Methods

add_entity

Add a number of tags to entity_tags.

add_to_gmsh

Add the Physical_Group object in GMSH.

remove_entity

Removes entities from the physical group.

Attributes

name

entity_tags

dim

Get the dimension of the Physical_Group object

tag

Get the unique tag of the physical group.
property tag

Get the unique tag of the physical group.

Returns

Unique tag of the physical group.

Return type

int

property dim: int

Get the dimension of the Physical_Group object

The following dimensions exist:

0: Point 1: Line 2: Surface 3: Volume

Returns

The dimension of the physical group.

Return type

int

add_entity(*entities)

Add a number of tags to entity_tags.

Parameters

*entities (PrimitiveGeo) – a number of entities

Return type

None.

Raises

Exception – Exception if the dimension of an entity does not match the dimension of the physical group.

remove_entity(*entities)

Removes entities from the physical group.

Parameters

entities (PrimitiveGeo) – A number of entities

Return type

None

add_to_gmsh()

Add the Physical_Group object in GMSH.

Return type

None.

Raises

Exception – Exception if there are no entities added to the physical group.
